price: Sε yεkakyerε wͻn sε, momͻ momu ase (nsom Onyankopͻn) a, wͻmmͻ wͻn mu ase.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
